author: Special Correspondent
text:
A woman was injured at Surancherry in Dharanallur after she allegedly set herself on fire on Saturday.

Sources said Soundarya (40) reportedly took the extreme step because of frequent quarrel with her husband Saravanan (40), a load man.

The neighbours, who came to know the incident, put out the fire and rushed her to the Mahatma Gandhi Memorial Government Hospital here. Her condition was stated to be serious. A case had been registered.
title: Woman sets herself on fire
